title: Janet Jackson dresses down in casual sweatpants as she spends some alone time without son Eissa
text:
She's rarely without her infant son, but Janet Jackson appeared to be enjoying some me time as she stepped out in London on Wednesday afternoon.

The American star was without two-year old Eissa, her only child with ex-husband Wissam Al Mana, while visiting a string of local stores in the English capital.

Wearing basic grey sweat-pants and matching sweater, Janet, 53, opted to dress down for her latest appearance in London, where she is currently based.

Solo appearance: She's rarely without her infant son, but Janet Jackson appeared to be enjoying some me time as she stepped out in London on Wednesday afternoon

But despite her loose-fitting ensemble Janet still managed to show off her curves while calling into a local greeting card shop.

With temperatures plummeting, the singer added to her look with a black woolen beanie hat and matching scarf, while blue flatform Converse boots rounded things off.

Accompanied by a friend, Janet easily mingled with oblivious shoppers as she went about her day.

Me time: The American star was without two-year old Eissa, her only child with ex-husband Wissam Al Mana, while visiting a string of local stores in the English capital

Low key: Wearing basic grey sweat-pants and matching sweater, Janet, 53, opted to dress down for her latest appearance in London, where she is currently based

In good company: Accompanied by a friend, Janet easily mingled with oblivious shoppers as she went about her day

The appearance comes after Janet admitted it's challenging juggling life in the spotlight with raising son Eissa.

'It is hard being a working mother. I don't have a nanny, I do it all myself,' she told Stellar magazine. 'Of course, when I'm working someone watches him, but it's my baby and me,' Janet added.

The five-time Grammy Award-winner, who shares Eissa with her ex-husband, Qatari billionaire Wissam, went on explain that fame isn't for everybody.

She added: 'You really have to be thick-skinned for this. You can really go in the wrong direction, there's so much temptation, all kinds of crazy things.'

Under wraps: With temperatures plummeting, the singer added to her look with a black woolen beanie hat and matching scarf

Finishing touches: Blue flatform Converse boots rounded off her casual ensemble

Let's go this way: The singer led the way as she and a friend toured a London street on Wednesday

Opening up: The appearance comes after Janet admitted it's challenging juggling life in the spotlight with raising son Eissa

Don't mind me: Oblivious shoppers appeared to be completely unaware of the superstar as she went about her day

Janet is among the ranks of big names to undertake Las Vegas residencies with her Metamorphosis show at the Park MGM, which ran from May to August earlier this year.

The sister of the late Michael Jackson has amassed one of the most impressive resumes in entertainment, with two Emmys and a Golden Globe among her many honours.

She was nominated for an Oscar for 1993 ballad Again from the drama Poetic Justice, which she made with late legends John Singleton and Tupac Shakur.

Success: The sister of the late Michael Jackson has amassed one of the most impressive resumes in entertainment, with two Emmys and a Golden Globe among her many honours

This must be the place: Janet was seen idling outside a local branch of women's clothing store Calzedonia
description: The American star was without two-year old Eissa, her only child with ex-husband Wissam Al Mana, while visiting a string of local stores in the English capital.
